Text:
if you just want the apps and avoid that stupid survey screen. just open the image with PowerISO or any program like it. and browse in the following directories

mostpopularapps/autoplay/buttons/android/android application
It asks for a password.. just use Ultraiso for example and extract the games..............

Kaspersky Antivirus shows that Most.Popular.106.Android.Apps.iso//autorun.exe contains the Trojan program:

Trojan-Ransom.Win32.Fullscreen.ahq
